author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Emerging-Market Troubles May Not Be Over - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Emerging-market assets from Mexico to Turkey rallied Thursday after weak inflation data eased concerns about tightening U.S monetary policy that have roiled those markets lately. But investors shouldn’t get too comfortable. The Mexican peso gained 1.8% against the dollar and the Turkish lira rallied 1.2%, while Brazil’s Bovespa stock index surged 1.9%. That comes after Energy Journal: Iran Deal Collapse Is Messing Up the Oil Order Next Stocks to Watch: Dropbox, Nvidia, Alphabet, Facebook, Verizon, Yelp, Symantec, Trade Desk
